Advanced Data Management <美>(Mitre公司)高级数据管理
亚当(<圣经>故事人物，相传为人类始祖)
[男子名] [英格兰人姓氏] 亚当来源于希伯来语人名，含义是据说为“男人，土，红土”(man,earth,red earth) 昵称Edie,Yiddie

sentence.Network_en: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

sentence.Network_en: Adam spent a lot of time in his grandfather's office.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当经常呆在他祖父的办公室里。

sentence.Network_en: Adam is clever enough, but he's also something of an egomaniac.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当足够聪明，但是他也有点自私自利。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 三．「世人」(希伯来文Ben-Adam是指「亚当的后裔」或世上的人类)，在七十士译本中被译为「人子」(uious anthropos)。因为希伯来文的「亚当」(adam)原意是“人”，而 Ben 是“儿子”。对基督徒来说，尤其是初期教会，「人子」是一个特殊的字眼，用来形.

Sentence.sentence: We tend to equate（等同于）happiness with freedom, but, as the psychotherapist and writer Adam Phillips has observed, without obstacles to our desires it's harder to know what we want, or where we're heading.
